content:
From: Lawrence Paulson <lp15@cam.ac.uk>
The University of Cambridge is currently advertising the prestigious Prince Philip Professorship of Technology. The previous incumbent was based in the Engineering department but the chair can be within any department within the School of Technology which includes the Computer Laboratory. Please do pass on the following job advert details to anybody who you think might find the position to be of interest:
http://www.jobs.cam.ac.uk/job/9898/

Further particulars from:
Dr Ivan Costantino on ivan.costantino@perrettlaver.com or +44 207 340 6210

Note that the deadline is now only 1 week away: 28th April 2016.
